qnaDocuments.answer:
DDK is focused on outcomes that add real, measurable value to your organisation.

We will provide the building blocks to get you to those outcomes.

These can be people with a certain skillset to meet a specific need, activities and products within the lifecycle of a project or the delivery of  tangible value to an organisation.

Whatever outcome is required, DDK is there to provide these services using a commercial model that suits you.

Our services include;

**Product Delivery**

The successful delivery of a program of work relies on a number of lifecycle products that you may not have time or resource to deal with but is still critical to a successful outcome.

We can deliver this for you.

**Skills Delivery**

The successful delivery of a program of work relies on a number of skilled individuals that you may need for a short time to get your delivery over the line.

We can provide these to you.

**Business Benefit Delivery**

Tangible and measured business benefit requires product delivery coupled with business change.

We can provide the full change programme to deliver real and measurable business value to your organisation.
questions: can you tell me what you sell

qnaDocuments.answer:
DDK is an IT Consultancy founded on shared values and principles, to work closely with customers to tackle their most important challenges, maximise value from investments and realise business benefits.

The three founders met when working alongside each other at the same client and immediately identified a harmony in how they worked and gelled together as a team. We enjoy collaborating together, whilst also listening to and respecting one another’s skills, opinions and professionalism.

We firmly believe this is the key to building a strong and effective team. DDK is a company founded around this ethos.

qnaDocuments.answer: Our clients cross utility, transport, government, finance both in the UK and across the world.

We are always looking for people. If your interested in us and what we want to do, we are interested in you, and what you do. Whatever your background or skill set.

If you want to know more, and see where this goes, simply ask me to contact you and we will speak soon.

My colleague, who is human, will contact you.

We offer flexible working. You will be based at home but we meet up regularly to see how its all going. 
Have a look at our website for details on our values and working ethos.

www.ddklimited.com
